title: Deposit Interest Rate in Mexico
description: Deposit Interest Rate in Mexico increased to 3.14 percent in August from 2.88 percent in July of 2022. Deposit Interest Rate in Mexico averaged 17.87 percent from 1976 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 126.02 percent in February of 1988 and a record low of 0.45 percent in June of 2021. The Deposit Interest Rate is the average rate paid by commercial banks to individuals or corporations on deposits. This page includes a chart with historical data for Deposit Interest Rate in Mexico.
author: IMF
